attributes.action: Introduce mandatory photo ID to vote in all elections and referenda
attributes.additional_details: Tackle the issue of voter fraud by making the introductory of photo ID to vote mandatory.
attributes.background: We call upon the Government to introduce legislation to make the production of photo ID mandatory.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/559890.
